review: I can find most of what's already on this stick on-line, so it may be more organized and pretty to look at  but I have a shortcuts bar for that.

review: I have both the fire stick and fire TV. If I had it to do over I would get two sticks. The cost is more effective and the stick is more convenient. Both products are great.  I especially loke the fire ap that I dowloaded free on my phone since I always know where my phone is but not so much the remote.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Gotta say I am impressed with the features of this small unit... It's super fast and loaded with great apps.. I did rate this with four stars because the remote at times is non responsive.. Also I wish more movies were on prime, I don't understand why 10 year old movies have to be purchased.. Had to rejoin Netflix due to that fact.. Also I thought this unit was battery operated but came to find out it needs to connected via a short wire... Other than that I like.. I use it every day, and simple to use..

review: Love the device works smooth and fast. Pity about the software though. Would like to be able to customize my home page a bit. Is still a bit buggy, but I do enjoy using it.
